OOC( Stasis lock is where the bot body siezes up and becomes 
inmoble.  The brain of th bot goes into a comatose state. So you 
can't move and your out cold)

::Feline::

She opened the doors to the chamber and watched Cybersharks body fall 
to the ground.  She knelt down and opened the back panel to his head. 
She opened her arm compartment and took out the chip.  She placed the 
chip at the base of the cranium case.  She then closed the head panel 
and activated the chip.  She would have to wait for HotRod to get out 
of his chamber to help her put CyberShark back into his. 

(OK, she went CyberChark is put back into the chamber and let alone 
to finish healing, he would become a Predacon and take Feline's 
orders.  He wouldn't be completely under her control, but he would be 
very inclined to so as she said. That is, untill he meet Zardus.)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:

you didn't)

>     He jerked ant twitched. He then went into Stasis lock. (Which 
does what exactly?)
